      • stringRGBToColor

        public static org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB stringRGBToColor(String rgb)
        Parameters:
        rgb - the rgb color in a string
        Returns:
        RGB class from String @param rgb. If @param rgb is null, empty or does not contains valid rgb description, return null Example: valid: 0,255,0 invalid: 0255,55
